headline: How The Narrative Around Norfolk Southern Is Changing After Analyst and Industry Updates
summary: Norfolk Southern stock has seen its consensus analyst price target inch up from $311.50 to $311.68 following recent updates by major research firms. This modest increase reflects a mix of optimism about the company’s near-term resilience alongside caution regarding broader market uncertainties. Read on to discover how you can stay informed about future shifts in analyst sentiment and market expectations for Norfolk Southern. Analyst Price Targets don't always capture the full story.
